input: user: A towering wave crashing onto a rocky shore, bathed in the golden hues of the setting sun. The scene is vibrant and dynamic, capturing the raw power and beauty of nature.
coverage: A towering wave, majestic and formidable, hurtles towards a rugged, rocky shore, its crest illuminated in the golden embers of a setting sun. The warm, radiant light casts elongated shadows and highlights the intricate details of the waves. Behind, the horizon blazes with rich oranges and purples, seamlessly blending sea and sky. This scene encapsulates a moment of awe, evoking a sense of natureâ€™s sheer power and the serene beauty inherent in chaos.
